wordGroup: unbiased estimate 不偏估计，公正（无偏）评价

sentences.en: There is no clear and unbiased information available for consumers.
sentences.cn: 没有清楚公正的信息提供给消费者。

sentences.en: For one thing, they're reliable insofar as they're based on unbiased samples.
sentences.cn: 首先，由于它们基于无偏见的样本，它们在这一范围内是可靠的。

sentences.en: We want an estimate of the proportion of oil which the blindfold, mill-turning, unbiased critic can squeeze out of you.
sentences.cn: 我们要的是估计一下，蒙着眼睛、转动着磨盘、不偏不倚的批评家能从你身上榨出多少油水。
